ygData.subject: RE: Kithicor Travels
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, going from WC to RV or HH - on the path take all right forks - until the last one which is more like a T - there go right to Rivervale and left to
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, going from WC to RV or HH - on the path take all right forks -
until the last one which is more like a T - there go right to Rivervale and
left to HighHold. Going the other way? Got to the T then all left forks.
This is of course when it is a "normal" zone. When they have the invasion
event going - not even the wall hugging will save you.

Sylly Songsynger
<Spirit of the Moon>
Bard of the 35th song
somewhere on Innoruuk

p.s. I was taking some "clueless newbie" through to qeynos one time and he
complained that it was too dark. this was before I had my infa vis song so
I didn't have a solution for him. well, he amazed me by going into one of
the shops by the wc zone and buying a lantern (or torch) - hehe guess I was
the clue-less one!

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 5:54 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kithicor Travels

From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>

----- Original Message -----
From: scott brisko <scott@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 5:14 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Kithicor Travels


> From: scott@... (scott brisko)
>
<snip>
> make me feel any better. I kicked up Selo's said a silent
prayer to Karana
> and bolted down the path to the South. Just passing the
HighHold marker I
<snip>

Word of advice - stick to the (right) wall. On the zone
from WC - hug the
wall - and keep doing so. Be careful not to take falling
damage -
especially around the RV zone. Get off the wall and run
around it. Get
back on the wall and hug it. You'll see "stone" again. Get
down - you'll
catch up with the trail and you can follow it a very short
way to the HP
zone.

It's safer - and easier to keep your party from getting
separated in the
dark and fog...

Slyde of Xegony
Level 26
